page.title: 03FARMING IMPROVEMENTS
page.content: Although farming has not affected conservation it has developed rapidly in recent years.Farmers say that their work is now much faster and easier because of the introduction of {machinery}.As the area produces little milk,it has been relatively unaffected by the{milk quotas}imposed by the{EEC. As farming techniques have advanced the use of isolated barns has decreased and some are in decay,while others have been converted into {holiday homes.}Farming is much more {intensive}now than formerly and so considerable use of{fertilizers}to increase the yields from fields, especially with crops such as{silage which is used as winter feed for the animals.In a good year two or three cuttings may be made.There is some {concern}about these{chemicals}on streams and rivers.
